SELECT dm.username, dm.password, dm.dormbuild_id as dormbuildId, dm.compound_id as compoundId, dm.manager_type as managerType, dm.name, dm.gender, dm.age, dm.phone_num as phoneNum, dm.email, dm.avatar FROM dorm_manager dm
AND (dm.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR dm.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR dm.manager_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
ORDER BY dm.username

SELECT dm.username, dm.password, dm.dormbuild_id as dormbuildId, dm.compound_id as compoundId, dm.manager_type as managerType, dm.name, dm.gender, dm.age, dm.phone_num as phoneNum, dm.email, dm.avatar FROM dorm_manager dm ORDER BY dm.username

SELECT dm.username, dm.password, dm.dormbuild_id as dormbuildId, dm.compound_id as compoundId, dm.manager_type as managerType, dm.name, dm.gender, dm.age, dm.phone_num as phoneNum, dm.email, dm.avatar FROM dorm_manager dm WHERE dm.username = #{username}
